subject: Tennis
Rogers Cup (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic won his second straight Rogers Cup title and third over all, beating Richard Gasquet, 6-3, 6-2, in Toronto.
snippet: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic won his second straight Rogers Cup title and third over all, beating Richard Gasquet, 6-3, 6-2, in Toronto.
